Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you cant have a permanent solution until the problem is fully understood

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: dealer node should run a blocknotify

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: based on numentropytx, creating enough to get to 100 entropy tx

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if this makes the chain run stable, then we learn what is very likely the problem

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and then we can attempt permanent solutions, but the dealer node doing blocknotify is likely part of the permanent solution

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: at least this is how I would go about solving this, but if you have better ideas, you can try

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but my years of debugging complex things, I always get the broken system back to a working state

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: otherwise you can flail about with the system in a nonworking state for a very long time

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: think about it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: each test when the system is in a nonworking state tells you what?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is like testing a car without any oil

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: depends what your looking for

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: likely it will have many problems

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: fixing the flat tire still doesnt fix the car

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so ALWAYS get a broken system back to working ASAP

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then each test you do will tell you if the new change breaks things or if it is still working

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so in this case, KMDICE is broken as a stable chain

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: which means the first thing to do is get it stable

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: THEN, we worry about the exact issue, as until it is stable we really are just guessing

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: working + test -> working or not working, either way valuable info

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: not working + test -> not working or working, only if the latter is anything learned and odds of fixing a problem that you dont fully understand is like trying to win at 1000 odds

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: KMDICE is basically a realtime system

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: very complex system behavior

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: of course, if the fix to the consensus bug is known, then just do it
